snippet.title: Layers of Fear: Solitude Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Layers of Fear: Solitude now on Google Play:
https://goo.gl/ZlqrIR

Layers of Fear is now on Daydream! Experience this fearful adventure in VR. With new level design to the old core game, new scares abound!

In Layers of Fear: Solitude, you’ll see the world through the eyes of a psychologically disturbed painter as he completes his magnum opus while battling ghastly visions and a crumbling psyche. 

Lose yourself in a beautifully detailed game world inspired by masterpiece paintings, architecture, and décor from the 19th century. Envelop your senses in works of art and music as you enter a dark world fraught with madness. Welcome to virtual insanity!

For more information on Layers of Fear: Solitude, visit https://www.layersoffear.com/

Developed by Bloober Team SA - http://blooberteam.com
Published by Aspyr Media - https://www.aspyr.com
